column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We got a variety of different plates-some of my favorites were the Brussels sprout salad
column2: chicken with peri peri sauce and steak with mashed potatoes. My favorite was hands down the burrata: the bread was crispy and light
column4: which was sweeter than I anticipated
column5: complemented the fresh mozzarella perfectly. Its like biting into a little cheesy piece of Heaven. The chorizo dates
column7: are worth a try as well. They were warm and amazing and I probably could've eaten 5 more.
